translations: （使）个性化；（使）适应个别需要；（使）表现出区别

sentences.sentence: You can individualize a document by adding comments in the margins.
sentences.translation: 你可以通过在页边的空白处添加评论来使文件与众不同。

sentences.sentence: Make sure to individualize our program.
sentences.translation: 务必使我们的节目个性化。

sentences.sentence: Does your style of writing individualize your work?
sentences.translation: 你的写作风格使你的作品具有个性吗？
